prompt.description: Use @Video1, @Video2, @Video3 to reference subjects from your videos. Works for people, animals, or objects. For multi-shot prompts: '[0-3s] Shot 1. [3-6s] Shot 2.' Max 800 characters.
prompt.title: Prompt

resolution.description: Video resolution tier. R2V only supports 720p and 1080p (no 480p).
resolution.title: Resolution

video_urls.description: Reference videos for subject consistency (1-3 videos). Videos' FPS must be at least 16 FPS.Reference in prompt as @Video1, @Video2, @Video3. Works for people, animals, or objects.
video_urls.title: Video Urls

items.limit_description: Max file size: 100.0MB, Min duration: 2s, Max duration: 30s, Timeout: 30.0s

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video.
aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio

duration.description: Duration of the generated video in seconds. R2V supports only 5 or 10 seconds (no 15s).
duration.title: Duration

enable_prompt_expansion.description: Whether to enable prompt rewriting using LLM.
enable_prompt_expansion.title: Enable Prompt Expansion

seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility. If None, a random seed is chosen.
seed.title: Seed

multi_shots.description: When true (default), enables intelligent multi-shot segmentation for coherent narrative videos with multiple shots. When false, generates single continuous shot. Only active when enable_prompt_expansion is True.
multi_shots.title: Multi Shots

examples: low resolution, error, worst quality, low quality, defects
negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to describe content to avoid. Max 500 characters.
negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt

enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, the safety checker will be enabled.
enable_safety_checker.title: Enable Safety Checker
